mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chatinfo (senduser, chattext, chatdate, receiveuser) VALUES (#{senduser}, #{chattext}, NOW(), "smhrd2")
mapper.select: SELECT senduser, chattext, chatdate, receiveuser FROM chatinfo WHERE receiveuser = #{receiveuser} ORDER BY chatdate ASC
SELECT senduser, chattext, chatdate, receiveuser FROM chatinfo WHERE (senduser = #{user} AND receiveuser = #{user}) OR (senduser = #{user} OR receiveuser = #{user}) ORDER BY chatdate ASC
